sentences.sContent: You have to be an individual; it’s no use running with the herd.
sentences.sCn: 你必须特立独行，随大溜没有用处。

sentences.sContent: Stefano used a motorcycle to herd the sheep.
sentences.sCn: 斯蒂芬诺骑一辆摩托车驱赶羊群。

phrases.pCn: 羊群行为；羊群效应；从众行为；群体恐慌行为

trans.tranOther: a group of animals of one kind that live and feed together
If you herd animals, you make them move along as a group
